game.name: Echoes of Myth
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Souls-lite combat meets roguelite progression in a broken world where you're chasing that perfect run. Loot and draw power from relics of vanished gods, forge devastating builds from spell and steel, and crush the wretches in your way!
